traits.name: Tunneler
traits.text: The umber hulk can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow Speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Rend
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 10 ft. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Confusing Gaze (Recharge 5-6)
bonus_actions.text: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: The target can't take Reactions until the start of the umber hulk's next turn, and the target rolls 1d8 to determine what it does on its next turn: 1-4. The target does nothing. 5-6. The target takes no action or Bonus Action and uses all its movement to move in a random direction. 7-8.
